addText(29161, "Server Uptime", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addHoverText(29162, "24/7", "Read Players Online", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addText(29163, "Players Online", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addHoverText(29164, ""+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" Players Online!", "Read Special Quest Journal", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); You See My Code… I Want It To Look Like This

Thats Kinda How I Want My Quest Tab To Look Like… This Is For PI Source So PI Codes Only Please! HELP ME PLEASE!
